mapper.insert: insert into t_yxinxi (yxinxiId, yxinxiName, yxinxiMark, yxinxiMark1, yxinxiMark2, yxinxiImg, yxinxiImgName, yxinxiDate, yxinxiType, yxinxiType1, yxtypeId, yxtypeName, yonghuId, yonghuName, yhbumenId, yhbumenName) values (#{yxinxiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yxinxiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxinxiDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yxinxiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yxinxiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yxtypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yxtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhbumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhbumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_yxinxi set yxinxiName = #{yxinxiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiMark = #{yxinxiMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiMark1 = #{yxinxiMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiMark2 = #{yxinxiMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiImg = #{yxinxiImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiImgName = #{yxinxiImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxinxiDate = #{yxinxiDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yxinxiType = #{yxinxiType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yxinxiType1 = #{yxinxiType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yxtypeId = #{yxtypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yxtypeName = #{yxtypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuId = #{yonghuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yonghuName = #{yonghuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhbumenId = #{yhbumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yhbumenName = #{yhbumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where yxinxiId = #{yxinxiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select yxinxiId, yxinxiName, yxinxiMark, yxinxiMark1, yxinxiMark2, yxinxiImg, yxinxiImgName, yxinxiDate, yxinxiType, yxinxiType1, yxtypeId, yxtypeName, yonghuId, yonghuName, yhbumenId, yhbumenName from t_yxinxi where yxinxiId = #{yxinxiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
